page.title: 13THE PELICAN INN,TACOLNESTON
page.content: Our pub (c.1686) is, I hope, like the school,{an integral part of the {village.}Our aim apart from running a business successfully & giving an out_ let for my culinary skills, is to involve the local community, not only by giving employment i.e.bar staff, handyman etc.but mainly by organising {"Pancake races""Easter bonnet parades" {"Xmas draws""Trips to Ascot" "Live {music",}even a sing_a_long to Fag Ash Lil at the piano. I do hope people find a welcome here, fine ales & food, but let's not forget the ladies, the coffee pot is always on. Nor the children _ our future customers _ there is a garden & pet goat. Apart from this we try & benefit the village by shopping locally,there_ fore money circulates. {So village life is lovely _ CHEERS! }
